channel.title: 8th Semester BSc. CSIT on CSITauthority 8th Sem
channel.description: Recent content in 8th Semester BSc. CSIT on CSITauthority 8th Sem

item.title: New Subject List
item.description: Based on course-update in late 2017. Effective from Academic year 2074. Related file course-update-TU-official.pdf View Download (917 Kb) a.viewLink{ color: #8451A1; } a.downloadLink{ color: #139948; } Subject Code Subject COMPULSORY CSC 461 Advanced Database CSC 462 Internship ELECTIVE Choose any two majors (atleast) CSC 463 Advanced Networking with IPV6 CSC 464 Distributed Networking CSC 465 Game Technology CSC 466 Distributed and Object Oriented Database CSC 467 Introduction to Cloud Computing CSC 468 Geographical Information System CSC 469 Decision Support System and Expert System CSC 470 Mobile Application Development CSC 471 Real Time Systems CSC 472 Network and System Administration CSC 473 Embedded Systems Programming MGT 474 International Business Management *Fair Warning: Internship consumes an ungodly amount of time from your daily life.

item.title: Old Subject List
item.description: Old subject list for pre-2017 students. Unless otherwise stated, students of Academic year 2074 and later shall not follow this list. Subject Code Subject COMPULSORY CSC 451 Data Warehousing and Data Mining CSC 452 Internship ELECTIVE Choose any two majors (atleast) CSC 453 Advanced Networking with IPV6 CSC 454 Distributed Networking CSC 455 Network Security CSC 456 Multimedia Database CSC 457 Distributed and Object Oriented Database CSC 458 Cloud Computing CSC 459 Geographical Information System CSC 460 Decision Support System *Fair Warning: Internship consumes an ungodly amount of time from your daily life.

item.title: New Syllabus and Microsyllabus
item.description: Nothing available for the new course(2074 course change) right now. If you have them, kindly fork and pull to update. Files a.viewLink{ color: #8451A1; } a.downloadLink{ color: #139948; } PDF a.viewLink{ color: #8451A1; } a.downloadLink{ color: #139948; } Files are bundled and zipped only when collections are complete This is YOUR website. The best way to start adding content is by clicking the  Edit this page button on the top-right corner of this webpage.

item.title: CSC451 Data Warehousing and Data Mining
item.description: Fork your own notes. Too complicated? Easily Upload on our Slack *Pro tip: Ebooks and Class-notes are also available for this subjectFiles are bundled and zipped only when collections are complete. This is YOUR website. The best way to start adding content is by clicking the  Edit this page button on the top-right corner of this webpage. Feel free to come knocking incase of any issues.

item.title: Ebooks
item.description: CSC451 Data Warehousing and Data Mining (DWDM) Join us on Slack to Upload your own ebooks or, if your prefer, fork it CSC452 Internship Books can’t teach you practical skills CSC453 Advanced Networking with IPv6 (IPv6) Join us on Slack to Upload your own ebooks or, if your prefer, fork it CSC454 Distributed Networking We don’t have ‘Ebooks’, per se, for this subject, we’re afraid.

item.title: All Other Subjects
item.description: We currently lack content on the following subjects. Help us out by contributing, if you’ve got them(Join our Slack, if that’s too complicated): Subject Code Subject CSC 455 Network Security CSC 456 Multimedia Database CSC 460 Decision Support System + All notes for the recently revised subject-list(See List of Subjects>New Subject List for more info) table tr, table th{ background-color: #FAE2E2; } Files are bundled and zipped only when collections are complete.

item.title: Credits
item.description: Contributors for 8th Sem Thanks to them for making CSIT community a better place ! .ghContributors { display:flex; flex-flow: wrap; align-content: flex-start } .ghContributors div { width: 50% ; display: inline-flex; } .ghContributors div label { padding-left: 4px ; } .ghContributors div span{ padding-left: 4px ; } .ghContributors img.imgStyle{ vertical-align:middle; margin-bottom:.25em; } .ghContributors div { margin-bottom: 5px; } .ghContributors div span { font-size: x-small; } .

item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: This is the barebones graph TD; A(Decide to Contribute) --|fork the repository| B[Make Desired Changes] B -- C{Is Change Good?} C --|NO| D[Make it good] D -- C C --|YES| E[Good! You're ready to share it with everybody] E --|commit and push to your forked repository| F(Make a pull request) I am a bit confused This walkthrough assumes that you have made a github account prior to doing this

item.title: Two Strokes
item.description: Minimal. Fast. Robust. The migration from Blogger CMS to Hugo demanded something radical. Following the design language, this is the answer. Two Strokes is completely vector generated with just two strokes and some mathematics! Why does it matter? Well, for starters, its scalable from that to this and, thats not the end of it. It renders fast; no compromises for Hugo. Now, only TU keeps you waiting, not our DOM.
